name: Vibrato adipiscing
desc: Donec et dui nec justo sodales scelerisque eu id dui.

steps.name: Scale in G in 8ves
steps.desc: 3 8ves up and down. One 8ve per bow. Do not pause on top note.

steps.name: 5-Note Scale in 6ths (B flat)
steps.desc: 5-Note Scale in 6ths (B flat, from D/Bb up to  A/F and back down) with joining vibrato. Do not pause on top note
